Description: Makkah Construction and Development (known as: MCDC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. MCDC operates within the Real Estate sector focusing on Diversified Real Estate Activities. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Real Estate Development and Diversified Real Estate Activities. MCDC is based in Mecca, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1989.
